LanguageData.ZP_Fish.label: Fish
LanguageData.ZP_Fish.description: Fish raised in aquaculture net. Mysterious fish whose taste changes according to cooking method.
LanguageData.ZP_SoyBeen.label: SoyBeen
LanguageData.ZP_SoyBeen.description: When cooking soybeans it can be treated as meat. Raw materials for miso and soy sauce.
LanguageData.ZP_Edamame.label: Edamame
LanguageData.ZP_Edamame.description: Although preservation and nutritional value are low, it is convenient as a substitute for meat because it grows fast.
